amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis and malaria programs by $300 million with offsets from the Millennium Challenge Account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding by $300,000,000 for HIV/AIDS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilpatrick amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 228 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Kilpatrick.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kilpatrick amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 228 (Roll no. 425).
